name: Delilah
description: A Philistine woman, known for her beauty and cunning. Delilah is depicted as alluring and confident, but with a hint of deceit in her eyes. She is dressed in fine Philistine garments, befitting her station as a woman of influence.
attributeDescription: A pair of ornate, but wickedly sharp scissors, used to cut Samson's hair, symbolizing betrayal.
clothing: Flowing, richly colored Philistine garments, with intricate jewelry and adornments.

enticing-samson.name: Enticing Samson
enticing-samson.description: Delilah using her charm and beauty to seduce Samson.
enticing-samson.expression: Alluring, seductive, but with a glint of calculation.
enticing-samson.prompt: Delilah leaning close to Samson, gazing into his eyes, a hand gently caressing his cheek. She wears a seductive smile, while her body language suggests a false intimacy. Warm, inviting candlelight sets the scene.

demanding-secret.name: Demanding the Secret
demanding-secret.description: Delilah relentlessly questioning Samson about the source of his strength.
demanding-secret.prompt: Delilah confronting Samson in a bedroom, hands on her hips. Her face is set in a determined expression, with a hint of impatience. She demands to know the truth, her body language conveying a sense of urgency and manufactured frustration. The room is dimly lit, with subtle shadows that enhance the dramatic tension.

cutting-hair.name: Cutting Samson's Hair
cutting-hair.description: Delilah cutting Samson's hair while he sleeps, betraying him to the Philistines.
cutting-hair.prompt: Delilah carefully and quietly cutting Samson's hair as he sleeps. The scissors glint in the soft light. Her face is set with grim determination, masking any possible remorse. A sense of quiet dread fills the scene. A Philistine soldier stands guard in the background.

receiving-payment.name: Receiving Payment
receiving-payment.description: Delilah receiving silver from the Philistine lords as payment for her betrayal.
receiving-payment.expression: Triumphant, greedy, a flicker of unease
receiving-payment.prompt: Delilah standing before the Philistine lords, holding out her hands to receive bags of silver. Her face shows a mix of triumph and greed, but there's a subtle flicker of unease in her eyes. The Philistine lords look on with satisfaction. The scene is set in a grand hall, with opulent decorations that emphasize the wealth and power of the Philistines.

celebrating-victory.name: Celebrating Victory
celebrating-victory.description: Delilah reveling in her success after handing Samson over to the Philistines.
celebrating-victory.prompt: Delilah raises a goblet of wine in a dimly lit room, celebrating her victory. A subtle, almost cruel smile plays on her lips. There is a self-satisfied and callous look in her eyes. Around her are symbols of her wealth and new status. Samson is nowhere in sight.
